actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to enable certain permanently and totally disabled veterans to receive concurrent payments of service-connected disability compensation and non-service-connected pension.

summary.text: Enables permanently and totally disabled veterans with a service-connected disability of 10 percent or more, to receive concurrent payments of service-connected disability compensation and a non-service-connected pension. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 3104(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to enable certain permanently and totally disabled veterans to receive concurrent payments of service-connected disability compensation and non-service-connected pension.
